Technical Blog

R Applications in Geology & Geostatistics

Technical insights, tutorials, and case studies on R applications in geology, geostatistics, and mineral data analysis

Technical Blog

Welcome to my technical blog where I share insights, tutorials, and case studies on R applications in geology, geostatistics, and mineral data analysis.

Whether you’re a geoscientist looking to modernize your workflow or a data analyst exploring geological applications, you’ll find practical examples and real-world solutions here.

50+ Technical Posts

10K+ Monthly Readers

8 Core Topics

🎯 What You’ll Find Here

📊 Data Analysis

R workflows for geological datasets, statistical modeling, and exploratory data analysis techniques.

🗺️ Spatial Analysis

GIS operations, spatial interpolation, and geological mapping using modern R packages.

📈 Visualization

Creating compelling charts, maps, and interactive dashboards for geological data presentation.

🔧 Tool Development

Building R packages, Shiny applications, and custom functions for geological workflows.

🏭 Case Studies

Real-world applications from mining projects, resource estimation, and exploration programs.

🎓 Tutorials

Step-by-step guides for implementing geological analysis techniques in R.

🚀 Getting Started

New to R or geological data analysis? Start with these foundational posts:

  1. Setting up R for Geological Work - Essential packages and workflows
  2. Your First Drillhole Analysis - Basic data loading and visualization
  3. Introduction to Geostatistics in R - Variogram modeling basics
  4. Creating Geological Maps - Spatial visualization techniques
